languages.text: Размер фазы завершения (и фазы ускорения — начальной фазы движения корабля, требуемой для некоторых способностей) зависит от установленного двигателя. Некоторые двигатели обладают хорошей динамикой и имеют увеличенные фазы завершения и ускорения (именно такой тип двигателя установлен на корабле изначально), другие обладают повышенной {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скоростью{/g} и оснащенный ими корабль может передвигаться быстрее.

The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.
languages.original_text: Размер фазы завершения (и фазы ускорения — начальной фазы движения корабля, требуемой для некоторых способностей) зависит от установленного двигателя. Некоторые двигатели обладают хорошей динамикой и имеют увеличенные фазы завершения и ускорения (именно такой тип двигателя установлен на корабле изначально), другие обладают повышенной {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скоростью{/g} и оснащенный ими корабль может передвигаться быстрее.

traits.locale_text: The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased speed, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased speed, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased speed, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

languages.text: Die Größe der Endbewegungszone (und der Beschleunigungszone – die anfängliche Phase der Bewegung des Schiffs, in der bestimmte Fähigkeiten genutzt werden können) hängt vom Motor ab, der auf dem Schiff installiert ist. Einige Motoren sind dynamischer und verfügen daher über erweiterte Endbewegungs- und Beschleunigungszonen (ein solcher Motor ist zu Beginn des Spiels auf dem Schiff installiert), während andere Modelle erhöhte {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} bieten und damit dem Schiff erlauben, sich in einem einzelnen Zug weiter fortzubewegen.
languages.original_text: The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

traits.locale_text: Die Größe der Endbewegungszone (und der Beschleunigungszone — die anfängliche Phase der Bewegung des Schiffs, in der bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} genutzt werden können) hängt vom Motor ab, der auf dem Schiff installiert ist. Einige Motoren sind dynamischer und verfügen daher über erweiterte Endbewegungs- und Beschleunigungszonen (ein solcher Motor ist zu Beginn des Spiels auf dem Schiff installiert), während andere Modelle erhöhte {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g} bieten und damit dem Schiff erlauben, sich in einem einzelnen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} weiter fortzubewegen.

languages.text: La superficie de la zone de fin de déplacement (et de la zone d'accélération, à savoir la phase initiale de déplacement du vaisseau, au cours de laquelle certaines capacités peuvent être utilisées) dépend du moteur dont est équipé l'appareil. Plus dynamiques, certains moteurs disposent de zones de déplacement et d'accélération plus étendues (l'un de ces moteurs équipe le vaisseau au début du jeu), tandis que d'autres modèles présentent une {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} accrue, permettant au vaisseau de parcourir de plus longues distances au cours d'un même tour.
languages.original_text: The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

traits.locale_text: La superficie de la zone de fin de déplacement (et de la zone d'accélération, à savoir la phase initiale de déplacement du vaisseau, au cours de laquelle certaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} peuvent être utilisées) dépend du moteur dont est équipé le vaisseau. Plus dynamiques, certains moteurs disposent de zones de déplacement et d'accélération plus étendues (un de ces moteurs équipe le vaisseau au début du jeu), tandis que d'autres modèles offrent une {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} accrue, permettant au vaisseau de parcourir de plus longues distances au cours d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: 终点区域的范围（以及舰船移动的初始阶段“加速区域”——舰船可以在此阶段中使用某些特定能力），取决于舰船的引擎。部分引擎拥有出色的动态效能，加速区域与终点区域的范围也会更大（在游戏开始时，玩家默认拥有一台这样的引擎）。还有的引擎拥有强大的动力，可以提供更高{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}，允许舰船在单个回合内移动得更远。
languages.original_text: The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

traits.locale_text: 终点区域的范围（以及舰船移动的初始阶段“加速区域”——舰船可以在此阶段中使用某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}），取决于舰船的引擎。部分引擎拥有出色的动态效能，加速区域与终点区域的范围也会更大（在游戏开始时，玩家默认拥有一台这样的引擎）。还有的引擎拥有强大的动力，可以提供更高{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}，允许舰船在单个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动得更远。

languages.text: El tamaño de la zona de aceleración final (y de la zona de aceleración, es decir, la fase inicial de movimiento de una nave, en la que se pueden utilizar ciertas capacidades) depende del motor que tenga instalado la nave. Ciertos motores son más dinámicos y, por tanto, cuentan con unas zonas de movimiento final y aceleración más amplias (al comienzo de tu aventura tendrás equipado uno de estos motores en tu nave). En cambio, otros modelos ofrecen mayor {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}, lo que permite a la nave recorrer más distancia en el mismo turno.
languages.original_text: The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

traits.locale_text: El tamaño de la zona de aceleración final (y de la zona de aceleración, es decir, la fase inicial de movimiento de una nave, en la que se pueden utilizar ciertas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}) depende del motor que tenga instalado la nave. Ciertos motores son más dinámicos y, por tanto, cuentan con unas zonas de movimiento final y aceleración más amplias (al comienzo de tu aventura tendrás equipado uno de estos motores en tu nave). En cambio, otros modelos ofrecen mayor {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}, lo que permite a la nave recorrer más distancia en el mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.original_text: The size of the completion phase (and the acceleration phase — the initial phase of the ship's movement required for some abilities) depends on the engine installed. Some engines have good dynamics and have increased completion and acceleration phases (this is the type of engine originally installed on the ship), others have increased speed and the ship equipped with them can move faster.

languages.text: 移動終了ゾーン（および加速ゾーン、つまり一部のアビリティが使用可能な船の移動の最初のフェーズ）は船に搭載されているエンジンに応じて決定される。エンジンには強力で移動終了および加速ゾーンも大きいものや、{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}を上げるモデルがある。ゲーム開始時に船に搭載されているエンジンが前者に該当し、後者は1回のターンで移動できる距離が長くなる。
languages.original_text: The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.

traits.locale_text: 移動終了ゾーン（および加速ゾーン、つまり一部の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が使用可能な船の移動の最初のフェーズ）は船に搭載されているエンジンに応じて決定される。エンジンには強力で移動終了および加速ゾーンも大きいものや、{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}を上げるモデルがある。ゲーム開始時に船に搭載されているエンジンが前者に該当し、後者は1回の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で移動できる距離が長くなる。

languages.text: Son hareket bölgesinin (ve geminin hareketinin ilk evresi olan, belirli kabiliyetleri kullanabildiğin hızlanma bölgesinin) boyutu, geminin motoruna bağlı olarak değişir. Bazı motorlar daha dinamiktir (oyunun başında gemine bu tür bir motor takabilirsin), bu nedenle de daha geniş son hareket ve hızlanma bölgelerine sahiptirler. Bazıları ise daha yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hızlar{/g} sunarak geminin tek bir turda daha uzağa ilerleyebilmesini sağlarlar.
languages.original_text: The size of the end movement zone (and the acceleration zone — the initial phase of the ship's movement, where certain abilities can be used) depends on the engine installed on the ship. Some engines are more dynamic and therefore have expanded end movement and acceleration zones (one such engine is installed on the ship at the start of the game), while other models offer increased {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, allowing the ship to move farther in a single turn.
